price: Unababwire inkuru ya Ibrahim (Aburahamu) mu gitabo (cya Qur’an, yewe Muhamadi). Mu by’ukuri yari umuhanuzi w’umunyakuri.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقٗا نَّبِيًّا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi ib'rāhīma innahu kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyan
